item.title: It's meme dump day.... Again... Vol. 148
item.description:
Hello friends :) Time for a meme dump. Hope you're all hanging on through the horrors.
Oh no.
.
And that's .... Bad?
.
We love a good nature poem
And boy I'm treading it
.
I dunno about the raisins but this is still funny
That is my breakfast though. Plus a bowl or two
.
That's it, yeah.
Sometimes we just must chomp
.
I mean....
I'm on board
.
I dunno crab legs might be pretty dope
.
It's true
Seeing my nice neurologist next week. Maybe something good will happen (she's going to inject me with Botox but not the fun make you pretty kind that hopefully makes the headaches stop.... Yes I know it's the same kind)
.
The perfect gateway to having a tolerable day
This wasn't supposed to be a coffee themed dump but here we are
Of course he does
Huh what a mystery
.
Lolll this feels like a personal attack a bit. It's ok we love Nadja and Laszlo too.
I'm so sick of censorship and euphemisms can we just say things?
Ok
*yes this is late **Yes I was
I've burnt every bridge so why not.
.
Crap
This is my type of witchery
.
Hence the meme dumps but since I suck at doing those too..,
.
I gotta say I love that no matter how rich these bastards are... None of them are remotely cool.
Fuck.
.
This is why I can't get to bed on time
Me, still trying to enjoy spooky season in November
I swear the estimates are always so wrong
.
Never, ever, ever, ever.
Please.
We got a little bit of the Aurora all the way in south Carolina when that G4 storm hit.
Fantus with the biggest puppy dog eyes
Goodnight friends, until we meet again.

item.title: How to converse 101
item.description: Part of my job is teaching people communication skills and I am often surprised by how many people don't understand the basics of conversation. This woman is teaching it to her kids in the context of being a good friend, but really, this basic "trick" applies to adult conversations as well. Also when meeting people for a first date! (I've seen a number of posts where people say they don't know how to act or what to say.) Source: Kelsey (KelseWhatElse) on Youtube, https://www.youtube.com/shorts/YfZoCJ5-lpg #til #parenting #adulting #laughandgrowfat #whinybitch

item.title: I've lost over 100 pounds!!!
item.description:
This is me at my heaviest: 360 about 5 years ago. About a year ago I began using Wegovy. It turned off all the food noise. Being raised in a family of large people like myself we ate all the time. Emotional eating, celebrations, funerals. You name it and we were eating. Comfort food. High calorie food. All the food! Did I mention we are all the time?
As you can see I was a round mom and grandma. You can't tell really that I'm disabled. My neck from C3 to C7 is fused with rods and screws and my lower back from L2 to S1 is also fused with rods and screws. I use a walker do to some permanent nerve damage in my feet so that I don't fall down and risk paralyzing myself. I also have a few autoimmune disorders just to make things really fun! Celiacs is one of them and I have many food allergies.
This is me now at 225 and wearing size large pants in women's and L on the top. This is the first time in 30 years that I've been in clothes that don't have an X involved! I feel pretty good at 56 now.
So much has changed in my life now. I'm off of the heavy hitting pain meds for my arthritis and nerve pain. I have a medical cannabis card and use edibles for my pain. I take half the dose of sleeping medication I used to take. I have the ability to play with my new dog Mango that I've posted about before. I won't be such a burden if my body continues to degrade. I'd like to reach 150 and then have all my Shar Pei skin removed. I'm feeling pretty proud of myself. Wegovy isn't magic by itself, I had to train my body to eat much less food and get my stomach used to not pigging out! It's still work but Wegovy turned off the emotional eating and the idea of comfort food. I eat when I'm hungry and that's it. For the first time I feel like I'm in control and not the food. Anyway, thanks for reading!
item.dc:creator: Gamerm0m

item.title: The king of antivaxx idiots is now the head of CDC
item.description: Unscheduled edit: I should have looked for the source before posting this. Source: https://arstechnica.com/health/2025/11/cdc-data-confirms-us-is-2-months-away-from-losing-measles-elimination-status/ This explains why we will lose our status and how falling vaccine rates are now a global issue: https://www.unicefusa.org/stories/measles-cases-are-soaring-globally-heres-what-you-need-know In the near future, sticking your hand in a used needles bin will be safer than visiting the states. Fuck anti vaccine propaganda, fuck Oprah for giving that propaganda a significant boost, and fuck every single grifter who is fully vaccinated but amplifies anti vaccine propaganda.

item.title: Michigan Senator Elissa Slotkin said her home was targeted by a bomb threat on Friday night, prompting Michigan State Police to search the property. No explosives were found.
item.description: The incident came just a day after Donald Trump accused Slotkin and several other Democrats of “seditious behavior,” including urging service members to reject unlawful orders. Slotkin thanked local law enforcement for their quick response, saying she was “deeply grateful for the swift and professional response by Oakland County and Michigan State Police.” She added that the U.S. Capitol Police will continue investigating the threat.
item.dc:creator: LunaAtlas

item.title: Fascist Spacekaren, fixing things
item.description: In completely unrelated news, a recently published analysis of Musk’s anti-woke, AI-generated ripoff of Wikipedia, “Grokipedia,” found that it cites the infamous neo-Nazi forum Stormfront as a source of information 42 times, NBC News reports.

item.description:
1. People here are told their iPhone is upgraded (it's not) I know a lot of people here are also iPhone users, but I feel they wouldn't fall for that. The average person on the street tho....
2. Yeahhhh
3
4. O shit
5
6
7
8. Pure chaos
9
10
11
12. Seriously what is Scroll Lock even for. I've never used it, I think just for one single flight sim game.
13. QA at it again...
14. Ay, yoo... Ubisoft what the fuck?!
15. Thank you if you made this far in the dump! Let me share with you that as well as posting on Imgur, I'm also working on a game of my own. A passion project, if you will. A psychological horror game mixed with ethical dilemmas. Regardless of your stance on AI in games, I have chosen not to use any for voice, script, assets and so on. I'm not outsourcing my passion, man. If you want to support it, please wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2719670/The_Milgram_Experiment/

item.title: They are the modern day gestapo without fear of consequences
item.description: Article 2, Section 4 of the U.S. Constitution outlines the process of impeachment, stating that the President, Vice President, and all other civil officers can be removed from office for conviction of treason, bribery, or other high crimes and misdemeanors. This section establishes the grounds for removing federal officials who are not accountable through elections alone, ensuring a balance between independence and accountability in government, according to The National Constitution Center. *WTF ARE WE WAITING FOR?! The destruction they have caused in a few months will take a lifetime to repair!!*
item.dc:creator: itsanoforme

item.title: Day 4 post-surgery!
item.description:
Hi everyone. I am gonna try to make this as concise as possible. TLDR: I’m sick, recovering from surgery and asking for help with medications and vet bills. Trying to raise 630, pypal is @sillygooseinc Pls read tho<3 I’m Emily, I have an illness called EGPA which is a kind of vasculitis, and I just had my second sinus surgery, 3 years after the first one. I am in a lot of pain, I’m struggling, and I’m attempting to crowd fund some necessities. I want to make it clear that I am involved with, or have at least attempted to be involved with, many other avenues when it comes to this kind of support. Things are progressing… but it takes a lot of time. A LOT of time, especially when it comes to disability claims. It’s a process that has made me cry out of pure frustration. All that to say, this is sort of my last resort/desperate attempt to find help for the urgent things I can’t put off. I have…. Nothing. There are two medications I have to get that aren’t covered by my insurance, that cost a total of $280 combined. This is at the barest of bare minimums that I could find with the help of my pharmacist. On top of that, both of my pet rats are conveniently having veterinary issues at the same time. They are supposed to have appointments together on Tuesday. The estimate there for both is about $350. So, grand total, I am desperately searching for $630. It’s a Hail Mary, a shot in the dark, a miracle?? If any kind and generous people magically help me reach this goal. I of course know this is a huge ask. I wish I could go mow lawns, wash windows, clean houses, anything to try to earn this money,.. but recovering from this surgery is kicking. My. Ass. So here we are. It’s not sustainable and it’s not my l ok my term solution but…. Here we are. Thank you for reading, and enjoy the post, there are some fun pics. Have a wonderful day everyone.
Fun piece of my last CT scan radiology report. My sinus infection had “fungal involvement”. Leading up to surgery I dealt with a two month long infection. It was so painful dude…. But worst of all, I had this smell deep in my nose, of straight up rot. Constantly. It made me at least 3X more miserable than just the pain itself.
My rat Peter Paul
Himb eating a treat
Deeble eating the same treat
Cuddle bugs.
Last doooodle
Aaaand a meme. You are welcome
Wanted to include this pic from my FIRST sinus surgery, which was performed on November 14th, 2022, almost EXACTLY 3 years ago. I like this picture because, my rat Steven was my recovery buddy last time. He was glued to me. Rats are extremely empathetic and intuitive, and he knew I needed extra love. This time around, my Deeble is providing that support, and he’s doing great. I feel so comforted by his presence. Oh my sweet boys, I love my rats so much.
item.dc:creator: DarkRatLord3000

item.title: Still hurts
item.description: Still sucks every year that passes. Ex husband had our embryos destroyed in the divorce too so it feels like I’ve lost five children. Just feeling “woe is me” right now. Edit: thanks so much for the support and advice. I keep waiting for the pain of it to disappear but it doesn’t. I’ll keep chugging along though
